name: Smart Watch
description: A black smart watch with a vibrant, abstract, fiery yellow and orange watch face. It has a black silicone strap and a single button on the right side.

name: Fitness Tracker Watch
description: A black smart watch with a black silicone strap and a classic analog watch face display with white numerals and hands. It has a single button on the right side.

name: Analog Sports Watch
description: A rose gold smartwatch with a white silicone strap, featuring a rectangular black screen and a single button on the side.

name: Digital Watch
description: A chronograph watch with a silver-tone metal bracelet and a dark grey dial. It features three subdials, yellow accents for numbers and hands, and multiple pushers on the side.

name: Luxury Smart Watch
description: A multi-function chronograph watch with a two-tone metal bracelet (black and rose gold) and a black dial with rose gold accents. It has multiple subdials and pushers.

name: Hybrid Smart Watch
description: A classic analog watch with a black dial, gold-tone case, and a black leather strap. The watch face has minimalistic gold markers and hands, with 'Daniel Wellington' branding.

name: Diving Watch
description: An elegant gold-tone analog watch with a white dial and a black alligator-patterned leather strap. It features Roman numerals, a date window, and 'RAYMOND WEIL GENEVE' branding.

name: Mechanical Watch
description: A classic mechanical watch with a silver-tone metal bracelet and a black dial. It features a red and blue 'Pepsi' bezel, a date window, and a cyclops magnification lens over the date.

name: Solar Powered Watch
description: A minimalist analog watch with a silver-tone case, a white dial with simple black hour markers, and a light beige leather strap. The brand 'THISISFETIQUETTE' is visible on the dial.

name: Smartwatch for Kids
description: A classic analog watch with a silver-tone case, a white dial, and a brown leather strap. The watch face features black hour markers and numerals, with 'RIDER' branding and a date window.

name: Wide-Angle Prime Lens 14mm

description: A black camera lens with a 'Nikon' logo and 'AF-S DX NIKKOR 55-200mm' text, centered against a grey background.

description: A black camera lens, marked 'Nikon AF-S DX NIKKOR 18-55mm', positioned on its side against a light grey background.

name: Super Telephoto Lens 400mm

name: Fish-eye Lens 16mm
description: A black camera lens with a textured grip, featuring a wide front element that reflects light, placed on a light surface with a blurred camera body in the background.

name: Portrait Lens 105mm
description: A black camera lens placed on a surface split diagonally between light blue and white colors.

name: Ultra-wide Zoom 14-24mm
description: A hand holding the rear element of a camera lens, revealing internal components and reflections of green foliage, against a blurred background of dark green leaves and orange berries.

name: Standard Zoom Lens 18-55mm

description: A black wireless computer mouse with a red scroll wheel, positioned on a wooden surface with a blurred background.

description: A black gaming mouse with a stylized logo and RGB lighting, featuring purple and green accents, resting on a textured mousepad with a blurred keyboard in the background.

description: A black gaming mouse with an illuminated white lion-head logo, glowing with blue and purple lights in a dimly lit setting.

description: A black gaming mouse with the 'LAMZU' logo in yellow, viewed from the side, on a vibrant yellow background.

description: A black ergonomic mouse with a silver scroll wheel, branded 'logi', positioned on a wooden desk next to a blurred laptop.

description: A black gaming mouse with illuminated red and white honeycomb patterns, and an 'acer' logo, seen from above on a colorful, abstract background with blue, purple, and green tones.

description: An ergonomic wireless mouse in a dark color, featuring multiple buttons and a textured scroll wheel, with blurred colorful lights in the background.

description: A silver laptop with a blank white screen, viewed from a slightly elevated angle, resting on a white surface with a blurred background.

description: A silver MacBook Air laptop with a blank black screen, positioned against a plain white background.
